content:
Peanut sauce is a great choice for these muffin tin noodle cups - it provides a nutty and slightly sweet flavor that complements the savory eggs, noodles, and vegetables. Here's a recipe for a simple peanut sauce you can try:

Ingredients:
- 1/4 cup creamy peanut butter
- 2 tablespoons soy sauce
- 2 tablespoons honey
- 1 tablespoon rice vinegar
- 1/2 teaspoon sesame oil
- Warm water

Instructions:
1. In a bowl, whisk together the peanut butter, soy sauce, honey, rice vinegar, and sesame oil until smooth. 2. Add warm water, one tablespoon at a time, until the sauce reaches a pourable consistency. 3. Taste and adjust seasoning, adding more honey or soy sauce if needed. 4. Drizzle or spoon the peanut sauce over the muffin tin noodle cups before serving. Enjoy your muffin tin noodle cups with peanut sauce!
